repairedDockerfile:
FROM ubuntu:16.04

ARG TIME_ZONE=Pacific/Auckland

ENV DEBIAN_FRONTEND noninteractive

RUN apt-get update && DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get --no-install-recommends install -y \
    curl \
    freetds-bin \
    freetds-common \
    freetds-dev \
    git \
    libsybdb5 \
    locales \
    nano \
    vim \
    unixodbc \
    tzdata \
    wget \
    zip \
    netcat \
    bc \
    ghostscript \
    graphviz \
    aspell \
    && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

RUN sed -i -e 's/# en_US.UTF-8 UTF-8/en_US.UTF-8 UTF-8/' /etc/locale.gen && \
    sed -i -e 's/# en_AU.UTF-8 UTF-8/en_AU.UTF-8 UTF-8/' /etc/locale.gen && \
    dpkg-reconfigure --frontend=noninteractive locales && \
    update-locale LANG=en_US.UTF-8

ENV LANG en_US.UTF-8
ENV LANGUAGE en_US.UTF-8
ENV LC_ALL en_US.UTF-8

# Set the timezone
RUN echo ${TIME_ZONE} > /etc/timezone \
    && dpkg-reconfigure --frontend noninteractive tzdata

# Install required packages to run phpbrew
RUN apt-get update && DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get --no-install-recommends install -y \
    autoconf \
    automake \
    build-essential \
    gettext \
    libbz2-dev \
    libcurl4-openssl-dev \
    libfreetype6-dev \
    libicu-dev \
    libjpeg-dev \
    libmcrypt-dev \
    libmcrypt4 \
    libmhash2 \
    libmhash-dev \
    libpng-dev \
    libpq-dev \
    libreadline-dev \
    libssl-dev \
    libxml2-dev \
    libxslt1-dev \
    openssl \
    php7.0 \
    php7.0-cgi \
    php7.0-curl \
    php7.0-fpm \
    php7.0-json \
    && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

# Install phpbrew
RUN mkdir /tmp/php \
    && cd /tmp/php \
    && curl -f -L -O https://github.com/phpbrew/phpbrew/raw/master/phpbrew \
    && chmod +x phpbrew \
    && mv phpbrew /usr/local/bin/phpbrew \
    && mkdir -p /opt/phpbrew \
    && phpbrew init --root=/opt/phpbrew \
    && echo "source /root/.phpbrew/bashrc" >> ~/.bashrc

RUN ["/bin/bash", "-c", "source /root/.phpbrew/bashrc"]

# Make sure we have know about old PHP versions too
RUN phpbrew update --old && phpbrew known --old

# Have the option of using the oh my zsh shell.
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y zsh && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
RUN sh -c "$( curl -f https://raw.githubusercontent.com/robbyrussell/oh-my-zsh/master/tools/install.sh)" -f --unattended
RUN git clone https://github.com/romkatv/powerlevel10k ~/.oh-my-zsh/custom/themes/powerlevel10k
RUN git clone https://github.com/zsh-users/zsh-autosuggestions ~/.oh-my-zsh/custom/plugins/zsh-autosuggestions
RUN git clone https://github.com/zsh-users/zsh-completions ~/.oh-my-zsh/custom/plugins/zsh-completions
RUN git clone https://github.com/zsh-users/zsh-syntax-highlighting ~/.oh-my-zsh/custom/plugins/zsh-syntax-highlighting

COPY entrypoint.sh /root/entrypoint.sh
RUN chmod +x /root/entrypoint.sh

ENTRYPOINT ["/bin/bash", "-c", "/root/entrypoint.sh"]
